R

Recipe - Class in utilities
Class used to store Recipe data for one recipe.
Recipe(String) - Constructor for class utilities.Recipe
Constructs a Recipe object for storing recipe data.
RECIPE_SUBSET_FILE - Static variable in class view.GUI
Name of a file that contains a list of 50 recipes.
recipeFavoriteButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Star button in the top left corner of the recipe window.
recipeIngredientCount - Variable in class view.GUI
Displays the number of ingredients it takes to make the recipe under the title in the recipe window.
recipeLength - Variable in class view.GUI
Displays the number of minutes it takes to make the recipe under the title in the recipe window.
recipeMenu - Variable in class view.GUI
"Window" that pops up when a user clicks on a recipe.
recipeMenuButton - Variable in class view.GUI
Red "X" button in the top right corner of the recipe window.
recipeNameCol - Variable in class view.GUI
Column in the GUI.searchResults table that stores the names of each recipe.
recipesFound - Variable in class view.GUI
Message that appears in the GUI.searchInfo node that tells the user how many recipes are in the recipe table.
recipeSteps - Variable in class view.GUI
Displays the number of steps it takes to make the recipe under the title in the recipe window.
recipeSubset - Static variable in class view.GUI
Default list of recipes to show when the user navigates to the search menu.
recipeTitle - Variable in class view.GUI
Title of the recipe shown in a bold font at the top of the recipe window.
removeFromFavorites(Recipe) - Method in class controller.Controller
Sends a recipe from the View to the Model to remove from its user favorites list.
removeFromFavorites(Recipe) - Method in class model.Model
Removes the given recipe from the user's favorites list.
removePantryItem(String) - Method in class controller.Controller
Sends an ingredient to the Model to be removed from the user's "virtual pantry".
removePantryItem(String) - Method in class model.Model
Removes an ingredient from the user's "virtual pantry".
resetFilter() - Method in class view.GUI
Deselects all filter CheckBoxes and resets the filter sliders and their selected values to their default states.
returnToPantry() - Method in class view.GUI
Switches from the GUI.pantrySearchMenu to the GUI.pantryIngredientsMenu when the GUI.backButton is clicked.
